Package org.jlab.coda.hipo

Class Compressor

java.lang.Object
org.jlab.coda.hipo.Compressor
public class Compressor extends Object
Singleton class used to provide data compression and decompression in a variety of formats.
Author:
gavalian, timmer

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    Compressor.ByteBufferBackedInputStream
    Use this class when decompressing GZIP data from a ByteBuffer.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Compressor getInstance()
      Get the single instance of this class.
      Returns:
      single instance of this class.

    • getMaxCompressedLength

      public static int getMaxCompressedLength(CompressionType compressionType, int uncompressedLength)
      Returns the maximum number of bytes needed to compress the given length of uncompressed data. Depends on compression type. Unknown for gzip.
      Parameters:
      compressionType - type of data compression to do (0=none, 1=lz4 fast, 2=lz4 best, 3=gzip). Default to none.
      uncompressedLength - uncompressed data length in bytes.
      Returns:
      maximum compressed length in bytes or -1 if unknown.

    • getCompressedBuffer

      public static byte[] getCompressedBuffer(CompressionType compressionType, byte[] buffer)
      Returns compressed buffer. Depends on compression type.
      Parameters:
      compressionType - type of data compression to do (0=none, 1=lz4 fast, 2=lz4 best, 3=gzip). Default to none.
      buffer - uncompressed buffer.
      Returns:
      compressed buffer.

    • getUnCompressedBuffer

      public static byte[] getUnCompressedBuffer(CompressionType compressionType, byte[] compressedBuffer) throws net.jpountz.lz4.LZ4Exception
      Returns uncompressed buffer. Depends on compression type.
      Parameters:
      compressionType - type of data compression to undo (0=none, 1=lz4 fast, 2=lz4 best, 3=gzip). Default to none.
      compressedBuffer - uncompressed array.
      Returns:
      uncompressed array.
      Throws:
      net.jpountz.lz4.LZ4Exception - if not enough room in allocated array (3x compressed) to hold LZ4 uncompressed data.

    • compressGZIP

      public static byte[] compressGZIP(byte[] ungzipped)
      GZIP compression. Returns compressed byte array.
      Parameters:
      ungzipped - uncompressed data.
      Returns:
      compressed data.

    • compressGZIP

      public static byte[] compressGZIP(byte[] ungzipped, int offset, int length)
      GZIP compression. Returns compressed byte array.
      Parameters:
      ungzipped - uncompressed data.
      offset - offset into ungzipped array
      length - length of valid data in bytes
      Returns:
      compressed data.

    • uncompressGZIP

      public static byte[] uncompressGZIP(byte[] gzipped)
      GZIP decompression. Returns uncompressed byte array.
      Parameters:
      gzipped - compressed data.
      Returns:
      uncompressed data.

    • uncompressGZIP

      public static byte[] uncompressGZIP(byte[] gzipped, int off, int length)
      GZIP decompression. Returns uncompressed byte array.
      Parameters:
      gzipped - compressed data.
      off - offset into gzipped array.
      length - max number of bytes to read from gzipped.
      Returns:
      uncompressed data.

    • uncompressGZIP

      public static byte[] uncompressGZIP(ByteBuffer gzipped)
      GZIP decompression. Returns uncompressed byte array.
      Parameters:
      gzipped - compressed data.
      Returns:
      uncompressed data.

    • compressLZ4

      public static int compressLZ4(ByteBuffer src, int srcSize, ByteBuffer dst, int maxSize) throws HipoException
      Fastest LZ4 compression. Returns length of compressed data in bytes.
      Parameters:
      src - source of uncompressed data.
      srcSize - number of bytes to compress.
      dst - destination buffer.
      maxSize - maximum number of bytes to write in dst.
      Returns:
      length of compressed data in bytes.
      Throws:
      HipoException - if maxSize < max # of compressed bytes

    • compressLZ4

      public static int compressLZ4(byte[] src, int srcOff, int srcSize, byte[] dst, int dstOff, int maxSize) throws HipoException
      Fastest LZ4 compression. Returns length of compressed data in bytes.
      Parameters:
      src - source of uncompressed data.
      srcOff - start offset in src.
      srcSize - number of bytes to compress.
      dst - destination array.
      dstOff - start offset in dst.
      maxSize - maximum number of bytes to write in dst.
      Returns:
      length of compressed data in bytes.
      Throws:
      HipoException - if maxSize < max # of compressed bytes

    • compressLZ4

      public static int compressLZ4(ByteBuffer src, int srcOff, int srcSize, ByteBuffer dst, int dstOff, int maxSize) throws HipoException
      Fastest LZ4 compression. Returns length of compressed data in bytes.
      Parameters:
      src - source of uncompressed data.
      srcOff - start offset in src.
      srcSize - number of bytes to compress.
      dst - destination array.
      dstOff - start offset in dst.
      maxSize - maximum number of bytes to write in dst.
      Returns:
      length of compressed data in bytes.
      Throws:
      HipoException - if maxSize < max # of compressed bytes

    • compressLZ4Best

      srcSize - number of bytes to compress.

      public static int compressLZ4Best(byte[] src, int srcOff, int srcSize, byte[] dst, int dstOff, int maxSize) throws HipoException

    • compressLZ4Best

      public static int compressLZ4Best(ByteBuffer src, int srcOff, int srcSize, ByteBuffer dst, int dstOff, int maxSize) throws HipoException
      Highest LZ4 compression. Returns length of compressed data in bytes.
      Parameters:
      src - source of uncompressed data.
      srcOff - start offset in src.
      srcSize - number of bytes to compress.
      dst - destination array.
      dstOff - start offset in dst.
      maxSize - maximum number of bytes to write in dst.
      Returns:
      length of compressed data in bytes.
      Throws:
      HipoException - if maxSize < max # of compressed bytes

    • uncompressLZ4

      public static int uncompressLZ4(ByteBuffer src, int srcSize, ByteBuffer dst) throws HipoException
      LZ4 decompression. Returns original length of decompressed data in bytes.
      Parameters:
      src - source of compressed data.
      srcSize - number of compressed bytes.
      dst - destination array.
      Returns:
      original (uncompressed) input size.
      Throws:
      HipoException - if dst is too small to hold uncompressed data

    • uncompressLZ4

      public static int uncompressLZ4(ByteBuffer src, int srcOff, int srcSize, ByteBuffer dst) throws HipoException
      LZ4 decompression. Returns original length of decompressed data in bytes.
      Parameters:
      src - source of compressed data.
      srcOff - start offset in src.
      srcSize - number of compressed bytes.
      dst - destination array.
      Returns:
      original (uncompressed) input size.
      Throws:
      HipoException - if dst is too small to hold uncompressed data

    • uncompressLZ4

      public static int uncompressLZ4(byte[] src, int srcOff, int srcSize, byte[] dst, int dstOff) throws HipoException
      LZ4 decompression. Returns original length of decompressed data in bytes.
      Parameters:
      src - source of compressed data.
      srcOff - start offset in src.
      srcSize - number of compressed bytes.
      dst - destination array.
      dstOff - start offset in dst.
      Returns:
      original (uncompressed) input size.
      Throws:
      HipoException - if (dst.length - dstOff) is too small to hold uncompressed data

    • uncompressLZ4

      public static byte[] uncompressLZ4(byte[] src, int srcOff, int srcSize, int maxDestLen)
      LZ4 decompression. Returns an array containing the original decompressed data in bytes.
      Parameters:
      src - source of compressed data.
      srcOff - start offset in src.
      srcSize - number of compressed bytes.
      maxDestLen - max available bytes to hold uncompressed data.
      Returns:
      original, uncompressed data. Length of array is length of valid data.
